00056 static double fastem( unsigned size, unsigned dim, unsigned num,
00057                       double* a, double* m, double* v, const double* x )
00058 {
00059     unsigned d, i, j, k, l;
00060     double   ll = 0;
00061 
00062     if( size == 1 ) {
00063         for( i = dim; i--; m[ i ] = v[ i ] = 0. );
00064 
00065         for( k = num, l = num * dim - 1; k--; )
00066             for( i = dim; i--; ) {
00067                 v[ i ] += x[ l ] * x[ l ];
00068                 m[ i ] += x[ l-- ];
00069             }
00070 
00071         a[ 0 ] = 1.;
00072 
00073         for( i = dim; i--; ) {
00074             m[ i ] /= num;
00075             v[ i ]  = v[ i ] / num - m[ i ] * m[ i ];
00076         }
00077     } else {
00078         double  px, t, marg, varg;
00079         double* mem = new double[ size * 2 * ( dim + 1 ) ];
00080         double* pi  = mem;
00081         double* na  = mem + size;
00082         double* nm  = mem + size * 2;
00083         double* nv  = mem + size * ( 2 + dim );
00084 
00085         //
00086         // set all variables to zero
00087         //
00088         for( i = size * ( 2 * dim + 1 ); i--; na[ i ] = 0. );
00089 
00090         //
00091         // loop over all data vectors
00092         //
00093         for( k = num; k--; ) {
00094             for( px = 0., i = size, j = size * dim - 1; i--; ) {
00095                 marg = 0.;
00096                 varg = 1.;
00097 
00098                 for( d = dim, l = ( k + 1 ) * dim - 1; d--; ) {
00099                     t = x[ l-- ] - m[ j ];
00100                     marg -= t * t / v[ j ];
00101                     varg *= v[ j-- ];
00102                 }
00103 
00104                 if( ! finite( marg ) || ! finite( varg ) )
00105                     pi[ i ] = 0.;
00106                 else {
00107                     if( varg < MIN_VAL )
00108                         varg = MIN_VAL;
00109                     px += ( pi[ i ] = exp( marg / 2 ) 
00110                             / sqrt( varg ) * a[ i ] );
00111                 }
00112             }
00113 
00114             if( px < MIN_VAL )
00115                 px = MIN_VAL;
00116 
00117             ll += log( px );
00118 
00119             for( i = size, j = size * dim - 1; i--; ) {
00120                 na[ i ] += ( pi[ i ] /= px );
00121                 for( d = dim, l = ( k + 1 ) * dim - 1; d--; ) {
00122                     nv[ j   ] += pi[ i ] * x[ l ] * x[ l ];
00123                     nm[ j-- ] += pi[ i ] * x[ l-- ];
00124                 }
00125             }
00126         }
00127 
00128         for( i = size, j = size * dim - 1; i--; )
00129             if( ( a[ i ] = na[ i ] / num ) > MIN_VAL )
00130                 for( k = dim; k--; j-- ) {
00131                     m[ j ] = nm[ j ] / na[ i ];
00132                     v[ j ] = nv[ j ] / na[ i ] - m[ j ] * m[ j ];
00133                 }
00134             else
00135                 j -= dim;
00136 
00137         delete[ ] mem;
00138     }
00139 
00140     return ll;
00141 }
